verses.text: O Lord, God \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* salvation, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* been crying \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* help \w by|strong="H5921"\w* day \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* night:
Let \w my|strong="H3068"\w* prayer come \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*; give ear \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w*:

\w For|strong="H8605"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* soul \w is|strong="H6440"\w* full \w of|strong="H6440"\w* evils, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* life \w has|strong="H0241"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w near|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* underworld.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am numbered among \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* go \w down|strong="H5060"\w* into \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H7646"\w* \w become|strong="H7646"\w* \w like|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* whom there \w is|strong="H5315"\w* no help:

\w My|strong="H1961"\w* soul \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* dead, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* underworld, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* whom \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w give|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w more|strong="H0369"\w* \w thought|strong="H2803"\w*; \w for|strong="H2803"\w* \w they|strong="H0369"\w* \w are|strong="H0369"\w* cut \w off|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* care.

\w You|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w me|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* lowest deep, \w even|strong="H5750"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* dark places.

\w The|strong="H7896"\w* weight \w of|strong="H8482"\w* \w your|strong="H7896"\w* wrath is crushing \w me|strong="H7896"\w*, \w all|strong="H7896"\w* \w your|strong="H7896"\w* waves have overcome \w me|strong="H7896"\w*. (Selah.)

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* sent \w my|strong="H3605"\w* friends \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* disgusting \w thing|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* eyes: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am shut \w up|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* not able \w to|strong="H5921"\w* come \w out|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3045"\w* eyes \w are|strong="H3045"\w* wasting \w away|strong="H4480"\w* \w because|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* trouble: Lord, \w my|strong="H3045"\w* cry \w has|strong="H3318"\w* \w gone|strong="H3318"\w* \w up|strong="H7896"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* every day, \w my|strong="H3045"\w* hands \w are|strong="H3045"\w* stretched \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w Will|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* works \w of|strong="H3068"\w* wonder \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dead? \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* shades come \w back|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* give \w you|strong="H3605"\w* praise? (Selah.)

\w Will|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* story \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w your|strong="H0518"\w* mercy \w be|strong="H4191"\w* given \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* house \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*? \w will|strong="H0518"\w* news \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w your|strong="H0518"\w* faith \w come|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* place \w of|strong="H4191"\w* destruction?

May there be knowledge \w of|strong="H5608"\w* \w your|strong="H5608"\w* wonders \w in|strong="H6913"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* dark? \w or|strong="H5608"\w* \w of|strong="H5608"\w* \w your|strong="H5608"\w* righteousness where memory \w is|strong="H6913"\w* dead?

But \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* did \w I|strong="H3045"\w* send up \w my|strong="H3045"\w* cry, O Lord; \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* morning \w my|strong="H3045"\w* prayer came \w before|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, why \w have|strong="H0589"\w* \w you|strong="H0413"\w* sent away \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul? why \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* face covered \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*?

\w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* troubled \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w death|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* time \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* young; \w your|strong="H3068"\w* wrath \w is|strong="H3068"\w* hard \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H4480"\w* \w strength|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0589"\w* heat \w of|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* wrath has gone over \w me|strong="H0589"\w*; \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* broken by \w your|strong="H5375"\w* cruel punishments.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* are round \w me|strong="H5921"\w* all \w the|strong="H5921"\w* day \w like|strong="H5921"\w* water; \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* made \w a|strong="H5921"\w* circle \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* sent \w my|strong="H3605"\w* friends \w and|strong="H3117"\w* lovers \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; \w I|strong="H3117"\w* am gone \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* memory \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* dear \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.
